holidays.title: National No-Code Day
holidays.description: No code, no problem. Celebrate the no-code movement and start automating your work.

holidays.title: National Promposal Day
holidays.description: Get ready to ask your boo to prom in a super elaborate way.

holidays.title: 311 Day
holidays.description: Rest assured that all your non-emergency services and requirements will be met.

holidays.title: Adelaide Cup Day
holidays.description: Get ready for the fastest horses and jockeys this March Public Holiday!

holidays.title: Canberra Day
holidays.description: On Canberra Day, let’s celebrate its rich history and its numerous contributions to Australia.

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day
holidays.description: The historic event is a public holiday in some of its states and honors history.

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day Canada
holidays.description: God Save the Queen and her Commonwealth! Celebrate the glorious history of the British Empire.

holidays.title: Debunking Day
holidays.description: Tired of getting confused by contradictory “facts” and stories, fake news, and myths?

holidays.title: Earth God's Birthday
holidays.description: Looking for a job or need more business? Earth God might grant your wishes.

holidays.title: Eight Hours Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the victory of the workers of Australia and an eight-hour workday with us.

holidays.title: Independence Restoration Day
holidays.description: Today, we congratulate our Lithuanian friends on their Restoration of Independence Day!

holidays.title: Key Deer Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let us do our part to aid these endangered species by spreading awareness.

holidays.title: Moshoeshoe's Birthday
holidays.description: Moshoeshoe Day honors an important figure who embodies the spirit of African unity.

holidays.title: National COVID-19 Day
holidays.description: You don’t have to have a cape to make a difference, as National COVID-19 Day proves.

holidays.title: National Dream Day
holidays.description: Who says you can’t achieve every one of your dreams? This special holiday begs to differ.

holidays.title: National Funeral Director and Mortician Recognition Day
holidays.description: Without their efforts, our loved ones wouldn’t get the sendoff they deserve.

holidays.title: National Heroes and Benefactors Day
holidays.description: Let us honor those who have generously contributed their service and support to Belize.

holidays.title: National Immune System Day
holidays.description: When Did You Last Say Thank You… to Your Immune System?  Think about it: As soon as you entered this world, your immune system took on…

holidays.title: National Johnny Appleseed Day
holidays.description: On this day, we thank Johnny Appleseed for introducing us to the joy of apples.

holidays.title: National Oatmeal Nut Waffles Day
holidays.description: Health-conscious people can celebrate the healthier option of this classic dessert.

holidays.title: National Payton Slaymaker Day
holidays.description: Through her story, Payton Slaymaker has touched and inspired millions of people.

holidays.title: National Sofrito Day
holidays.description: Spice up your meals with sofrito. It works with meat, vegetables, and even pies.

holidays.title: Ramadan Begins
holidays.description: Let us join our Muslim brothers and observe Ramadan with fasting, prayer, and faithful intention.

holidays.title: Taranaki Anniversary
holidays.description: Prepare for some history, today we are going to learn about Taranaki and its conflicts.

holidays.title: Wash Your Nose Day
holidays.description: Keeping our noses clean has a new literal meaning, and it keeps the doctors away.

holidays.title: World Day of Muslim Culture Peace Dialogue and Film
holidays.description: Ever wondered about the Muslim Culture? Here’s your chance to get your questions answered.

holidays.title: World Plumbing Day
holidays.description: Let us commemorate the day that ensures our cities and towns are always sanitary.

holidays.title: Worship of Tools Day
holidays.description: Show off your D.I.Y. skills and put those tools to use on this day.

holidays.title: Zhonghe Festival
holidays.description: Get ready for this yearly festival as “the dragon raises its head.”

holidays.title: Dionte Gray’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this talented and determined hairstylist and wig specialist.
